msContents.summary: Part of a roll. Contains a medical work focusing on the practical application of medicine and pharmacology against lung diseases.

msItemStruct.note: This fragment does not come from the same roll as P. Lund. inv. 4 but is very close to it in chronology, style and contents
Publication status: Assigned to Isabella Andorlini, Facoltà di Lettere e Filosofia dell'Università degli Studi di Parma, Parma, Italy
Former shelfmark or inv. no.: Chur 32 R c (in pencil on old glass frame)

origin.origPlace: Tebtunis, Polemonos meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

provenance.p: Purchased in Berlin by Lund University Library in 1933, from prof. Carl Schmidt; Isabella Andorlini "Scavi e acquisti di papiri negli anni '30: il caso dei PLund" in Comunicazioni, Firenze 1995, Istituto papirologico G. Vitelli, p. 45-50

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

listBibl.bibl: Unpublished (Assigned Isabella Andorlini, Parma) but cf. P. Lund I 6, published by Albert Wifstrand, Literarische Fragmente, Aus der Papyrussammlung der Universitätsbibliothek in Lund I, 1935, Kungl. humanistiska vetenskapssamfundets i Lund årsberättelse and Isabella Andorlini, Trattato di medicina su papiro, Istituto papirologico G. Vitelli, Firenze 1995
